item.title: Citations, Data
item.description: Field Field Value Name Citations, Data Can Apply To Research data sets and journal articles that describe them. Metric Definition The number of times a journal article or book has referenced a data set. Metric Calculation Data citations are sometimes collected only in the formal sense (i.e., with the data set being listed in the References section of a paper, alongside journal articles).
